com.topcoder.search.builder
Interface SearchStringBuilder

All Known Implementing Classes:
DatabaseSearchStringBuilder, LDAPSearchStringBuilder
Deprecated. This public class is not used any more

public interface SearchStringBuilder

This interface only defines one method. The method is used to construct the search string from the Filter Each data store system sub-package should implement this interface to convert the Filter to specific search string.

Version:
1.3
Author:
ShindouHikaru, TCSDEVELOPER

Method Summary
 java.lang.String buildSearchString(Filter filter)
          Deprecated. Construct the search string from Filter Please refer to the concrete implemetor in each sub-component (data store) for details.
 

Method Detail

Deprecated.

Returns:
a string constructed from the Filter
